Article.ArticleTitle: Correction: Baicalein inhibits fibronectin-induced epithelial-mesenchymal transition by decreasing activation and upregulation of calpain-2.

AbstractText: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via a link at the top of the paper.
